description: This file defines an AuthService class responsible for handling user authentication by providing methods for registration, login, and logout. It interacts with an API using Dio for HTTP requests and updates authentication state via AuthState.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class that provides authentication-related API interactions, including registration, login, and logout functionalities. It manages tokens and user info through collaboration with AuthState.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user by sending their email, password, and name to the backend. If successful, it automatically logs in the user to obtain and store an authentication token.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user with email and password. Upon success, stores the token and user info via AuthState.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the user by clearing authentication data from AuthState.

methods.name: _extractErrorMessage
methods.description: A private helper method to extract a user-readable error message from DioError responses.
